name: CSR and marketing – making sustainability pay
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Smart developers have realised investing in better performing buildings makes financial sense. Occupiers have CSR policies that demand minimum energy performance from their buildings and there are other benefits including attractiveness to potential employees and how they are perceived by the public. This in turn drives demand for more sustainable buildings and helps maintain portfolio values.

presentations.name: Changing the focus of sustainability: From sustainability 1.0 to 2.0
Beyond compliance: corporate image as a driver for sustainable real estate
The new paradigm for CSR: reconnecting the needs of society with the agenda of the (real estate) business
